data.name: Rune Factory 5 - The Holy Knight and the Bibliophile Swimsuit Set + New Ranger Care Package Item Pack
data.detailed_description:
Soak up the sun on Beach Day dressed as Rune Factory 4 favorites, Forte and Kiel!

Get a helping hand as a rookie Ranger, with a set of items to get you started.

The New Ranger Care Package Item Pack includes:
9 x Orange Juice
9 x Cooking Bread
9 x Tomato Seed
9 x Healing Potion

"Forte's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Kiel's Swimsuit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.

data.short_description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 5 on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
